name: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C)
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough
Add mozzarella cheese slices
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Roast chickpeas with olive oil at 400°F for 20 minutes
Cube and roast sweet potato until tender
Massage kale with lemon juice and olive oil
Arrange all ingredients in a bowl
Drizzle with tahini dressing

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and herbs
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side
Let chicken rest, then slice
Chop vegetables and combine with greens
Add sliced chicken on top
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions
Heat sesame oil in a wok over high heat
Add minced garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli)
Add softer vegetables (peppers, snap peas)
Toss with soy sauce and serve over rice

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes
Warm taco shells in oven
Chop lettuce and tomatoes
Fill shells with beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream

name: Lentil Curry
steps: Sauté diced onion, garlic, and ginger in oil
Add curry powder and turmeric, toast for 1 minute
Add lentils, diced tomatoes, and coconut milk
Simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender
Stir in fresh spinach until wilted
Serve over rice or with naan bread

name: Salmon with Asparagus
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Place salmon and asparagus on baking sheet
Drizzle with olive oil and melted butter
Season with minced garlic, dill, salt, and pepper
Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon flakes easily
Serve with lemon wedges

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Heat vegetable broth and keep warm
Sauté diced onion and garlic in butter
Add arborio rice, toast for 2 minutes
Add wine, stir until absorbed
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Fold in sautéed mushrooms, butter, and parmesan
Season and garnish with fresh thyme
